content: I believe that the publisher of papers should make sure that their news articles are as accurate as possible. As for opinion articles, they are just that opinions. An it is the reader’s responsibility to weigh their value. What is more important is that newspapers find a way to become financially viable in today’s media market. We as consumers of news must be willing to compensate fairly for the information we consume. For this is the only way that news outlets, papers, TV, internet, will be able to research the validity of sources of information that form news stories.
